plot outline: Being the owner of a matrimonial company, Thiru has conducted plenty of marriages. The 100th marriage he is set to handle happens to be his own. Even though he and his beloved face a few setbacks but he is now finally engaged to be married to her. One day, while drunk, he accidentally sends a message to the wrong girl instead of his fiancee. Chaos ensues when the issue gets blown out of proportion.
title: Charlie Chaplin 2
plot: A marriage is in the verge of trouble as the groom sends an abusive message to the bride under the influence of alcohol. Will he able to save the wedding?

Being the owner of a matrimonial company, Thiru has conducted plenty of marriages. The 100th marriage he is set to handle happens to be his own. Even though he and his beloved face a few setbacks but he is now finally engaged to be married to her. One day, while drunk, he accidentally sends a message to the wrong girl instead of his fiancee. Chaos ensues when the issue gets blown out of proportion.::adsripathi
